name: radyation@1.7Hz
description:
Radiative motion mediated by sine waves. Was once a beautiful SVG of the animated sort but damaged through successive treatments of noise and manual adjustments. Shot through an Apple Macintosh II at 640x480 (upscaled to 1280x960) for a certain quality of pixelation at an intermediate stage. Later, was gifified w/ love. Retouched again manually.

Prepared 3 ways. This one is measured at 1.7 Hz.

Animated GIF
1280x960
